channel.title: Multiple Bitmap problem
channel.description:
In my script i am trying to use more than one bitmap but i keep getting an error on the second bitmap that says: [code]Unknown identifier 'bitmap2' in script[/code]
here is the procedure [code]procedure LoadBmps; begin bitmap1:= BitmapFromString(83, 15, 'z78DAA559D972ED280' + 'CFC25B3C3A300F1FF9F340D222772B03373EFA02A87C23E2C6AB5' + So can someone please help me out?
Thanks Alot! :D

item.title: Multiple Bitmap problem
item.dc:creator: @extreme300 extreme300
item.description:
@extreme300 wrote:

thank you very much yackman…i seem to have overlooked that

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple Bitmap problem
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

put
var
Bitmap2:integer
somewhere in your script

Read full topic

item.description:
